DOC.brief_summary: The researcher aim investigate relationship ABO blood type erectile dysfunction .
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective study do Ordu university Hospital among patient administer urology polyclinic April 2013 April 2014 . Sexually active 102 patient whose blood type know include study . While 56 patient sexual intercourse problem 46 group take control group . Individuals sexual partner whose sexual intercourse continue unproblematic ally accept normal . Individuals sexual intercourse though sexual partner unable maintain intercourse accept sexual dysfunction . Patients ' sexual function evaluate via İEFF-5 question form . In session patient ' blood type also record İEFF-5 ( Erectile Function International Evaluation Form ) symptom score compare blood type .
DOC.criteria: Male , person sexual intercourse Female , sexual intercourse
